name: @upendra.manike/secure-deps-scan
description: Lightweight supply-chain scanner for Node projects. Flags risky dependency patterns (postinstall scripts, deprecated or unmaintained packages).

exports.name: scanDependencies
exports.description: Scan package.json and lockfile for risky dependency patterns.
exports.problemSolved: Need a quick pre-publish/pre-deploy check for dependency risks beyond npm audit.
exports.commonUseCase: Run before publishing or deploying to catch suspicious dependencies.

useCases: Scan dependencies for risky install scripts
Augment npm audit with custom checks
